website_summaries.verdict: An acceptable choice if you need a strong box in a compact size, but it's not practical if you have a large tackle collection.
pros: Portable size (15.75" x 5.90" x 7.50") holds numerous pieces of tackle, tools, and fishing accessories
Strong straps and comfortable shoulder padding
cons: A bit on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fishing bag
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bag I could walk up and down the surfline with in OBX. I initially was wanting a backpack, but stumbled onto this. It holds all the hard and soft lures I need, plus. Over the shoulder or as a fanny pack
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like it
customer_reviews.text: I asked for a fishing pack for my Father's Day and this is what my wife gave me. I love it so far. The quality seems to be good and there are plenty of pockets and compartments. I bought a couple Plano 6-21 boxes to go in it and they are a tight fit, but fit none the less. I've been fishing with it once so far and it worked as well as I'd hoped it would. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great little bag! My husband had went on about how much he wanted one these size to keep with him at all times! So I gave it to him as a wedding gift in our wedding day filled with stuff! It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a makeshift first aid kit. It suits my purposes very well
customer_reviews.author: David Nagel

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: perfection! small and light. great tackle-bag for a canoer!! love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you want
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag! Has enough storage for everything you want to carry with you, yet still small enough that it won't be in the way or to much to carry on a hot day. It came with both a waist and shoulder strap. Really well thought out, no surface went to waste. There is a pocket or a clip or snap or strap everywhere on here. Plenty of room in the main bag for stowaway containers or just piling in everything you need for the day. And that's just one section of the bag! I'm thrilled that I decided to get this bag over a vest, as I can see myself using this bag for lots of other activities besides fishing.
customer_reviews.author: hockey guy

customer_reviews.title: ... June because he loves to fish and needed a better fishing bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fiance in June because he loves to fish and needed a better fishing bag. It is very well made and he is very happy with it! It is now September and it still looks brand new even after fishing the whole summer and setting it in the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Serqet07

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room!!
customer_reviews.text: The YOGAYET tackle bag is great. Has lots of room and is comfortable to wear as a fanny pack. Also comes with a shoulder strap for addition support or wear as a sling style pack. Quality of construction is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: John Wetherbee

customer_reviews.title: Small tackle box easy carry
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller item than expected for the price I will stick with wall Mart next tackle box. I am useing for panfish tackle satisfactory for a jig box some tails, hooks, and bobbers
customer_reviews.author: Shoe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag
customer_reviews.text: I chose this bag because of all the positive review. They weren't lying. This is a quality bag, the canvas is tough but also looks good. Not to mention the layout of the bag is great too (everything looks well thought out). The "fanny pack" strap is really comfortable and attaches securely (Velcro and snaps around a loop). Id recommend getting the tackle box inserts bundle. They are the perfect size and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time however I was not too happy with the purchase I thought it was bigger just like the picture it’s very small it looks like a lunch bag I purchased the $59.00 one with containers thinking that it would be big where my husband can put all his fishing line and gear inside it’s really small maybe not worth the price I should have gone with another square looking fishing box with more compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Fish beware
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my needs, well constructed and comes with 2 inserts with many compartments to store things, only used one as the other compartment is for all my other gear. lots of pockets to store stuff.
customer_reviews.author: tom mulrooney

customer_reviews.title: Very good for a variety of storage and easily configurable
customer_reviews.text: Good design and seems to be made of very rugged denim like material with three plastic lure boxes included. You can choose what and how you wish to use these included plastic but fixed size removable compartment boxes. Plenty of extra external pockets for whatever you need to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great bag at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great bag at a great price. Plenty of room for tackle, weights, lures, a drink etc. Not your entire tackle box but a trip to a lake, the surf, a river, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: my fiance loved this for his birthday
customer_reviews.text: my fiance loved this for his birthday. I filled it with all kinds of goodies and he especially liked the "beer holder". Somewhat smaller than expected but otherwise great product and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your favorite Fisher man
customer_reviews.text: It's very durable. My son said it's very packable easy to toss into the truck and exactly what
customer_reviews.author: Alice Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Real Sturty
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my husband to help separate his fresh water fishing gear from his salt water gear.
customer_reviews.author: Savina S D Jeffcoat

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would have more space than it does
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Daily Fishing Tackle Bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice daily use fishing tackle bag. Excellent quality construction, Nice material, lined pockets, strong quality zippers. Plenty of pockets and good storage capacity for a daily use tackle carrying bag. Much easier to carry around than a tackle box. Also makes me commit to a specific fishing technique for each fishing excursion.
customer_reviews.author: Tina G

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, no so big, no so small, perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for about 4 or 5 14" Trout
customer_reviews.text: holds my beer while I fish... need i say more? Perfect size for about 4 or 5 14" Trout. I carried some back in this bag about 6 miles on hike to an isolated glacial melt lake in Alaska. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Naterball

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I feel that this is going to last me a while!!
customer_reviews.author: GJW

customer_reviews.title: A well made and thought out piece of Equipment
customer_reviews.text: This bag is impressive and beautiful, from the quality to the well thought out dimensions, it has everything you need for a smaller daytrip fishing kit bag. The nylon is high quality and the zippers/seams are solid. Versatile handle on top plus the waist band that can detach to store in a pocket on the back which is what i was really looking for as I creek/pond fish quite a bit where there is walking involved. **I wanted waterproof tackle boxes in this and it fits 2 of those 9" water tight PLANO boxes you can get at wal-mart perfect. Plus it has a water bottle holder and 2 fishing pole holders, well thought out YOGAYET!
customer_reviews.author: john eberhardt

customer_reviews.title: nice bag but very small
customer_reviews.text: not as big as I thought, nice bag but very small. Giving as a Christmas gift. We will see how the person likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Collins

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but smaller than expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but smaller than expected for the price. Diagram in the photo shows length over 15 inches and appears to indicate the length of the bag itself. But apparently they included the mesh water bottle holder in their measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then i thought.
customer_reviews.text: Well made but much smaller then i thought. Bought myself a different that was smaller(according to specs) and i could fit two maybe three of this one in mine.
customer_reviews.author: player339

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Smaller then expected but will make my fishing fantastic🎣
customer_reviews.author: Michael Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tackle box for bank fishing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tackle box for bank fishing, or fishing out of a kayak or two-man boat. Holds everything you need for a day on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fantastic travel bag as well as fishing tackle bag. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Ketcheson

customer_reviews.title: A good little tackle bag.
customer_reviews.text: Liked how this bag came. It fit about everything I need for fishing. Only I got it felt a little small. But it's as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. It's tough, has tones of pockets and straps. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Very cool tackle bag
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for ice fishing. I don't use much so this is perfect. I even got my depth finder in there and still not bulky
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best ever. Very well made. You will not be disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: George Strukow

customer_reviews.title: grandson was very pleased. Would consider purchasing another with all the fishing ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift, grandson was very pleased. Would consider purchasing another with all the fishing gear he owns.
customer_reviews.author: susan albertz

customer_reviews.title: buy really nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is smaller than I expected, buy really nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie Little

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the perfect size and the quality excellent. I use it for surf fishing. It carries everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dec

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well made and a perfect size. Love the bottle and rod holders.
customer_reviews.author: Ward_51

customer_reviews.title: Still a very nice start tackle box
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as advertised but I returned it because my husband wanted a backpack-style one instead. Still a very nice start tackle box.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal D

customer_reviews.title: This is about the size I thought. Maybe too ...
customer_reviews.text: This is about the size I thought. Maybe too many bells and whistles. The place to put a water bottle is too small
customer_reviews.author: Paige N. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great carrier bag for a fishing trip! fresh water and salt. quality made !
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Raposa

customer_reviews.title: allaround grate bag
customer_reviews.text: grate product just what I was looking fore cant wait to use it
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, High quality bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and very functional bag. Holds a ton of stuff and is easy to keep very organized.
customer_reviews.author: Amoreena Roetemeyer

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome. It looks small but it holds so much
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome. It looks small but it holds so much. I will be buying a second for my buddy.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: For a small bag it holds a lot. Great quality. Great edition
customer_reviews.author: joshua shultz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent size for day trips
customer_reviews.text: Made very well. Holds 2 Plano 3650 in the main compartment. Excellent size for day trips. 2 gripes. The drink holder is just a little bit small. Very snug on a 12 oz can. Not great for some water bottles or tumblers. The mesh pockets under the top lid tend to dump everything out when tilted back for accessing the main compartment. Turning the openings 90 degrees would be a fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amplyfied Noize

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: The material does not feel very strong. The waist strap comes out of the plastic very easily. Zippers sometimes have issues opening/closing, and sometimes split open. The main compartment can fit 2 Plano 3600 series boxes (11" x 7-1/4" x 1-3/4"). I don't see any possible way you could fit anything larger. Overall, feels cheap, but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: much smaller than i was anticipating and would not work for my intended purposes.
customer_reviews.author: G-Money

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but husband seems to like it. I ended up spending the extra money ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but husband seems to like it. I ended up spending the extra money for the plastic cases that fit perfectly. I'm sure you could find a cheaper option but it was convenient and I'm glad I did it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This is so much better than a tackle box
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than a tackle box. No squatting down to get things. And when you're walking your hands are pretty much free.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Flammang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size bag for an expedition on the river!!! I just received this bag and I must say after handing the bag it is well made and the quality for the price is unbeatable. One other aspect, is the bag has enough space for all that one needs and remains accessible and easy carry on and this is made possible due to how well made the bag and the straps are. I will update this review once I have used the bag out on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Don Campos

customer_reviews.title: Great idea poor execution.
customer_reviews.text: Initially the bag was perfect. It holds two 6500 boxes in the main pouch and a few spools of leader in the side pouch with room for random stuff. What kills if for me is that the bad isn't water resistant at all making it unusable in the kayak and something I had to pay attention to when wading. Opening up the bag and finding a bunch of rusting hooks and mold was not a great experience. Lastly the waist strap broke while hiking. It caught on the bank as I climbed down and popped the threads.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron K. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is being falsely advertised it is not the correct size that's on the website too small for anything
customer_reviews.author: Craig  Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and just the right size, it’s not that small as others suggest and it’s just perfect for day fishing from the bank
customer_reviews.author: sporting road

product_meta.title: Yogayet Portable Outdoor Fishing Tackle Bag Multifunctional Lure Waist Fanny Pack Water-Resistant Soft Sided Shoulder Carry Strap Storage
product_meta.description:
Storefront Link://www.amazon.com/shops/yogayet

Basic information: 

Capacity: 12-15L

Net Weight: 750g/1.65lb Colors: Camo,Green,Khaki(Optional) 

Main material: 600D Water-Resistant Oxford Fabrics 

Size (L*W*H):15.75"*5.90"*7.50"/40*15*19cm

Shoulder strap length (Max.): 133cm/52.36"

Waist strap length (Max.): 98cm/38.58"

Structure: one main compartment,two side pockets and one front pocket

Application: leisure time, sports, traveling, daily life

Designs and Functions: 

●Well capacity storage area for fishing gear and tackle boxes

●The fishing bag zipper all adopt the YKK zipper accurate occlusion

●High quality buckle is durable, non-toxic and environmentally friendly

●Lengthened and widened shoulder pads designed to ease shoulder fatigue 

●Fishing tackle bag with fishing rods belt design can be fixed rod convenient and practical

Package Included: 

1* Fishing Tackle Bag

Tips: 

To keep your fishing tackle bag looking its best hand wash in cool water with detergent,do not bleach,hanging to dry.Do Not Tumble Dry.

feature_bullets: Dimensions(L*W*H):15.75"*5.90"*7.50"/40*15*19cm,well capacity storage area for gear and tackle boxes.
YOGAYET fishing tackle bag is made of water-resistant 600D high density nylon fabrics, multiple storage compartments and exterior pockets, designed for outdoor sports.

The fishing tackle bag zipper all adopt the YKK zipper, （YKK zipper represents zipper industry standard), accurate occlusion, applied smoothly ,high quality and practical, durable texture, zipper head with card buckle design.
Reinforcing straps, lengthened and widened shoulder pads design. Come with both waist and shoulder strap ,can be used as shoulder messenger bag. waist bag ,handbags and sling bag.

High quality buckle is made of high-strength ABS material, durable, non-toxic and environmentally friendly , smooth and powerful, With high-intensity military nylon webbing, adjustable length, more durable.
